title: Daily reminder Riven has a 53% win rate and a 20% pick rate in diamond

replies.body:
Daily reminder that {{champion:92}}  actually has **16%** pick rate and  52% win-rate in Diamond.

Daily reminder that compared to other champs in Diamond-
1. {{champion:103}}  has 17% pick-rate and 55% win-rate in Diamond.
2. {{champion:67}}  has 35% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond
3. {{champion:412}}  has 43% pick-rate and 50% win-rate in  Diamond.
4. {{champion:222}} has 25% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond.
5. {{champion:1}}  has 14% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond
6.  {{champion:39}}  has 16% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond.
7.  {{champion:111}}  has 20% pick-rate and 53% win-rate in Diamond.

Everyday.
those champions except nautilus all needs nerfs

Nautilus needs them more than anyone else. He is uncounterable in the bot lane. I mean, I love the idea of an abyssal titan and his artwork, but c'mon. He was just about balanced back when his playerbase was bawling their eyes out about how squishy he was.

he jsut got a nerf and thresh does counter him bot lane his damage was nerfed too much they dont intend to let him go back jungle and his team fight ability is nerfed from that loss of damage that wasnt much to begin with it was just  high for early game expecially considering that he doesnt build ap
That's how it is with champions nobody plays. They can be broken as shit, but the mains will cry until they are FotM. The term "Stealth OP" exists for a reason.
Rammus last season... only reason I made it to diamond is that no one cried for him to be nerfed despite his across the board 55% win rate all season until the very end of the season.

Don't worry: because he's a tank it seems like everyone will protect him as much as they possibly can from nerfs for some reason. 

I don't get it.
Boom. Hi Im Dovahkiin laying the smackdown.

> [{quoted}](name=Hi im Dovahkiin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-10T07:37:49.801+0000)
>
> Daily reminder that {{champion:92}}  actually has **16%** pick rate and  52% win-rate in Diamond.
> 
> Daily reminder that compared to other champs in Diamond-
> 1. {{champion:103}}  has 17% pick-rate and 55% win-rate in Diamond.

Fuck this champion,seriously,facerolling garbage,I definitely think she could use some nerfs.

> 2. {{champion:67}}  has 35% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond

The meta is...a bit in her favor at the moment,she is too strong right now,but might not need nerfs if riot intends to shift the meta anytime soon(otherwise...yeah,nerfs).

> 3. {{champion:412}}  has 43% pick-rate and 50% win-rate in  Diamond.

God this thing should've been nerfed so long ago,I don't even,you know what,let's just rename the game to "league of thresh" and be done with it,riot is clearly in bed with this guy.

> 4. {{champion:222}} has 25% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond.

Adc's tend to get narrowed on due to limited champion pool,25% for an adc is borderline fine.

> 5. {{champion:1}}  has 14% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond

Is fine due to the fact she is both popular as a support and as a mid laner.

> 6.  {{champion:39}}  has 16% pick-rate and 52% win-rate in Diamond.

Is definitely somewhat over the top.

> 7.  {{champion:111}}  has 20% pick-rate and 53% win-rate in Diamond.

Got nerfed already.

> Everyday.

I mean at least riven has a rather loyal playerbase,there's no excuse for the rest of these guys.
Idc about her damages but fuck that tankyness from that shield with very low CD, no cost and 1 AD ratio.

Because it's a retardedly op bs 0 skill garbage with what every kid can reach masters given they play 24/7.

Just ban it.

0 skill my ass. I'm platinum and I can't play her if my life depended on it (but don't find her difficult to play against).

Diamond also has a much shorter player pool and a lot of those players got to that elo because of their skill with a specific champion - the whole "1 trick pony" deal.

> [{quoted}](name=legitm8,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-10T07:43:33.438+0000)
>
> 0 skill my ass. I'm platinum and I can't play her if my life depended on it (but don't find her difficult to play against).
> 
> Diamond also has a much shorter player pool and a lot of those players got to that elo because of their skill with a specific champion - the whole "1 trick pony" deal.

Or you are just  bad that's all.

Also i have no  problem with 1 trick ponies. At least they managed to learn 1 champ properly when 99% of the playerbase can't even do that.
I'm not the one who can't counterplay a Riven. Let me know when you get out of elo hell bud :)

> [{quoted}](name=legitm8,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-10T09:47:32.464+0000)
>
> I'm not the one who can't counterplay a Riven. Let me know when you get out of elo hell bud :)

I can counter play Riven . And im already out from elo hell. Cya when u hover around d2. Oh wait u never will.
Plat is a lot better than the vast majority of the playerbase. If you're so damn good, how come you aren't playing ranked?

> [{quoted}](name=TotalJerk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2015-07-10T16:15:02.427+0000)
>
> Plat is a lot better than the vast majority of the playerbase. If you're so damn good, how come you aren't playing ranked?

Maybe i have multiple accounts to spread the reports? Wohoo.

And saying PLats are better? No not really. Never got the impression while heading through plat that "ye this is it this is teh gaem".. In plat every match is over within 5m inutes as the amount of tryhard-ish QQ complaining shitstaned motherfuckers are just overwhelming in sheer numbers.
That sounds less like a reason and more like salt and Johns.

> [{quoted}](name=Hasztalan2,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-10T09:09:02.106+0000)
>
> Or you are just  bad that's all.
> 
> Also i have no  problem with 1 trick ponies. At least they managed to learn 1 champ properly when 99% of the playerbase can't even do that.

I don't think that one trick ponies deserve to be on the elo that they are

They just abused a champion that is ridiculously strong and that's how they are on that elo

An actual platinum/diamond player would know a much higher variety of champions and lanes, not just stick to one.

> [{quoted}](name=YumaS2Astral,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0001000000000002,timestamp=2015-07-10T18:20:56.437+0000)
>
> I don't think that one trick ponies deserve to be on the elo that they are
> 
> They just abused a champion that is ridiculously strong and that's how they are on that elo
> 
> An actual platinum/diamond player would know a much higher variety of champions and lanes, not just stick to one.

This is the dream of some1 who never been in high elo. Just fyi most ppl can play maximum 2 lanes with 4-5 champions. One trick ponies commit into 1 champion fully. I don' t like them either but stating that  they do not deserve their elo because they stick to 1 champ is bs. There are guys who are diamond with {{champion:86}}  or {{champion:78}}  only. THey don't deserve their rank either?

I agree 100%. Riven is strong early, mid, and lane game. All you have to learn with her is her stupid combo which is BS anyways and you'll win all trades in lane. Not hard just spam her and you'll get good with her
I'm honestly ok with it because the average Riven player in plat+ has 152 games on her. A 53% win rate with that level of experience is totally reasonable imo.
source?

> [{quoted}](name=sixdogman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-07-10T17:43:37.661+0000)
>
> source?

champion.gg

of course... thanks for the (what should have been obvious) source... 

I think it is important to point out that you only need 15-20 games to break 50% win rate, so it's not like it takes 150 games to start doing well with her. low-ish skill floor with a high skill ceiling and all that.

> [{quoted}](name=sixdogman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-10T18:20:23.384+0000)
>
> of course... thanks for the (what should have been obvious) source... 
> 
> I think it is important to point out that you only need 15-20 games to break 50% win rate, so it's not like it takes 150 games to start doing well with her. low-ish skill floor with a high skill ceiling and all that.

The thing is it's 15-20 ranked games,It's impossible to tell how many normals were played before.

Could be a lot,could be nothing,there's just no way to tell(it's annoying,I know)

Daily Reminder Heimerdinger has a 53% winrate in all elo's on average.

Nerf.

See how stupid that sounds?
Heima has very clear weaknesses

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dvbKrHuB,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-10T17:31:45.789+0000)
>
> Daily Reminder Heimerdinger has a 53% winrate in all elo's on average.
> 
> Nerf.
> 
> See how stupid that sounds?

It's 53% winrate **AND** 20% pickrate(according to champion.gg riven is the most played top laner in plat+).

Now I'm not exactly taking his side(she does have a very dedicated playerbase,most of which appears to be toxic shitheads,but I digress),but I'd say the pickrate is the big factor here,the winrate is just a bonus.
Yes, we all hate Riven. I'm not sure if Riot cares at this point. Or maybe there's some counterplay that Riot knows that we don't. She's annoying regardless.

This. Why the fk do ppl in my elo (plat) ban Sejuani and Gragas? This isn't the LCS.

Always ban Riven and Ahri. Almost guaranteed to force a dodge or get a free win (on either side) due to the amounts of 1 trick ponies playing them.
Because both riven and ahri are beatable in lane while gragas is an unkillable monster that can also 100-0 you.
How can Gragas 100-0 you - he isn't an assassin, unless he is building full AP he can't do that, and if he is building full AP you can 100-0 him
53% win rate is actually pretty good when you consider balance. Really anything between 48 and 52 is pretty good, 53 is pushing it a little but not too much
daily reminder that she never made it to competitive play for the most part because she's a pubstomp

52% actually. 

Ahri has over 57% by comparison, and is actually played even more often.
